question: Electrical conductivity of metals expressed in ohm-1 m-1 is of the order of
explanation: Conductivity is reciprocal of resistivity. Since resistivity of metals is around 10-7 ohm-m, conductivity is about 107 ohm-1 m-1. So 105 is the nearest value.
